channel.title: life on zhongjzsb

item.title: 足球梦
item.description: 前天晚上半夜睡不着觉，脑子里面不停的盘旋， 妄图解决phd期间未能解决的科研问题。 直到第二天凌晨五点多才终于睡了3个多小时。 于是昨晚10点不到

item.title: 宅在家的牢骚
item.description: 2020不知不觉就过去了快三分之一。 回头稍微看看，发现自己这一年都生活在对于各种事件的担心之中。 担心这担心那，其实也完全做不了任何事情。只不

item.title: 在家上班 (work from home)
item.description: 从3月9号周一开始在家上班到今天，已经整整一个月。已经渐渐熟悉了在家工作的节奏。 偶然间觉得未来肯定会： 越来越多的公司实行在家上班的政策，即使

item.title: When Will the Next Light Bulb Go Out?
item.description: Today our 💡 bulb in the second floor went out. It looks like this: This is a special light so that we cannot buy a general bulb to replace the old one. The only option left to us is to buy a new whole light. Jackie and I was discussing about how many lights we need to buy. So first thing comes to my mind is that the lifetime of a bulb is exponentially distributed.

item.title: Back to Github
item.description: Finally Something about github if you want to delete commit from github, here are the steps you want to use Reference website. git reset --hard \<commit-id\> git push origin -f

item.title: Best Food in Tsinghua
item.description: I will definitely miss the “PAIGUTANG” the most!
